column5: " Hey Guys - was out fishing yesterday, turned around and the bracket for the power head on my Fishhawk lost one of the side clips that holds it in place. Is is possible to order another one? What do you need to get the right model ? Thanks" "Hi Rick, just send us your address and we'll mail one out to you." Thank you, Trevor   This is actually the second time I have ha d a similar experience with these guys. 3 years ago I had a Fishhhawk TD that wasn't functioning properly. I emailed them and asked about it. They sent me a new one, no questions asked.  Now, if I can just get that skunk out of the boat.
